title: Lord Jesus, In Thy Precious Name

v1: Lord Jesus, in Thy precious name,
At Thy request we gladly meet,
v2: As on that dark betrayal night,
We too, the bread and cup would take,
v3: The bread, Thy body does portray;
By which our sin was put away,
Our peace was made with God.
v4: The host art Thou, O blessed Lord,
v5: Lord Jesus, whom unseen we love,
As thus we muse on Thee;
We none would see, save Thee alone,
